segments.text: Do you like the apartment so far ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I noticed that the faucet in the kitchen is leaking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s going to be a problem when my water bill comes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you want me to do about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like you to fix the problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I won ’ t be able to do that right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I won ’ t be able to rent the apartment until the problem is fixed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , I ’ ll have it fixed for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m happy that we ’ Ve come to an agreement .
segments.speaker: S2
